summary: Finn is an Argonian Follower wit preset spells and weapons. Give him somthing stronger and he will use that weapon or armor in battle.
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=#b4a7d6][size=4]Location
[/size][/color][/b]Finn is located in the Dead Mans Drink in Falkreath. Just walk up to him and ask him to follow you.

[size=4][color=#b4a7d6][b]Compatibility[/b][/color]
[/size]-Needs the latest version of Skyrim
-sharpshooters ENB is recommended but not needed

[color=#e06666][size=5]Installation
[/size][/color]To install, download manually. then place the file into your Skyrim data folder. Run your Skyrim launcher and check your data files. Make sure that Finn the follower is clicked and you are good to go.Â 

To uninstall just simply go to your Skyrim data folder and delete the "Finn the Follower" file

[color=#ffe599]This is my first mod so any/all comments and suggestions are welcome.[/color]
author: SausagePocket
